official_title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on Pyrrolo (3,4-C) Pyrrole-1, 4-Dione, 2,5-Dihydro 3,6-Diphenyl.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1994, the duty on pyrrolo (3,4-C) pyrrole-1, 4-dione,2,5-dihydro 3,6-diphenyl.

titles.title: To suspend until January 1, 1995, the duty on Pyrrolo (3,4-C) Pyrrole-1, 4-Dione, 2,5-Dihydro 3,6-Diphenyl.
